member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Area
member.summary: An area of a PDF page that can have its own coordinate space and default options.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Area.CoordinateSpace
member.summary: A custom coordinate space for the area.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Area.GraphicsOptionsRef
member.summary: Graphics options to use by default within the scope of this area.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Area.TextOptionsRef
member.summary: Text options to use by default within the scope of this area.

member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.BoxItem
member.summary: Base class for boxes page elements.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.CoordinateSpace.Width
member.summary: Width of the element expressed in the custom coordinate space. If missing, the width is expressed in the same unit as the underlying physical coordinate space.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.CoordinateSpace.Height
member.summary: Height of the element expressed in the custom coordinate space. If missing, calculates the height based on the width, conserving the aspect ratio.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Document.GraphicsOptionsRef
member.summary: Graphics options to use by default within the scope of the document.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Document.TextOptionsRef
member.summary: Text options to use by default within the scope of the document.

member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Figure
member.summary: Base class for figurative PDF page elements.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Figure.GraphicsOptionsRef
member.summary: Graphics options to apply to the figure.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.GraphicsOptions.TemplateRef
member.summary: Reference to a graphics options to use as template.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Image.ImageRef
member.summary: Reference to a definied ImageObj element.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Image.Placement
member.summary: Placement or positioning of the image (Stretch, Center, LeftOrTop, RightOrBottom, LeftOrBottom, RightOrTop).

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Image.Rotation
member.summary: Free rotation of the image (i.e. "45", "45Â°", "45deg", "0.7854rad", "12.5%" and "0.125frac" are all equivalent).
member.remarks: If a free rotation is given, the image height, placement and imagerotation settings are ignorded. The image is drawn on it's X,Y location with given width and matching height and requested rotation.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Image.ImageRotation
member.summary: Rotation of the image (None, Left, Right, UpsideDown).

member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.ImageObject
member.summary: An image object that can be referenced from in pages.

member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.ModelItem
member.summary: Base class for all PDF model types.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.ModelItem.Id
member.summary: An Id given to the element to facilitate identification by code.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.ModelItem.Class
member.summary: Classes (space-separated class names) of the element to facilitate classification by code.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.ModelItem.ClassValues
member.summary: Read-only accessor to get all class names in array form.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.ModelItem.Hidden
member.summary: Whether the element should be hidden.

member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page
member.summary: A page in a PDF document.

member.name: M:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new page in a PDF document.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page.Height
member.summary: Custom height of the page (if not using the Format).

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page.Width
member.summary: Custom width of the page (if not using the Format).

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page.CoordinateSpace
member.summary: Coordinate space to use on this page.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page.GraphicsOptionsRef
member.summary: Graphics options to use by default within the scope of this page.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Page.TextOptionsRef
member.summary: Text options to use by default within the scope of this page.

member.name: T:Arebis.Pdf.Model.PositionalItem
member.summary: Base class for positional page elements.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Rectangle.Rotation
member.summary: Rotation of the rectangle (i.e. "45", "45Â°", "45deg", "0.7854rad", "12.5%" and "0.125frac" are all equivalent).
member.remarks: Note that if the rotation is given, the radius parameter is ignored.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Rectangle.Radius
member.summary: The radius of the rectangle (to form rounded rectangles).

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Text.TextOptionsRef
member.summary: Reference to a text options to use.

member.summary: Content key of this text element for lookup in the ContentSource dictionary.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.Text.Rotation
member.summary: Rotation of the text (i.e. "45", "45Â°", "45deg", "0.7854rad", "12.5%" and "0.125frac" are all equivalent).

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.TextBlock.TextOptionsRef
member.summary: Reference to a text options to use.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.TextBlock.Content
member.summary: Content (text) of this text block element.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.TextBlock.ContentKey
member.summary: Content key of this text block element for lookup in the ContentSource dictionary.

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.TextBlock.Rotation
member.summary: Rotation of the text block (i.e. "45", "45Â°", "45deg", "0.7854rad", "12.5%" and "0.125frac" are all equivalent).

member.name: P:Arebis.Pdf.Model.TextBlock.Alignment
member.summary: Alignment of the textblock ("left" or "-1", "center" or "0", "right" or "1")
